Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.legacyformat.base

Interface Placeholder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the argument
All Superinterfaces:
Function<T,ReplacementBase>
public interface Placeholder<T> extends Function<T,ReplacementBase>
An interface to create a ReplacementBase from the argument.
